parameters.name: MaintainEndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of the maintenance window. Specify the time in the *HH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The end time must be later than the start time of the maintenance window.

parameters.name: MaintainStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the maintenance window. Specify the time in the *HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
